messages.subject: Online Magazines ready for viewing!
messages.msgSnippet: Hi there everyone, All the online magazines are now ready for viewing.  Please check them out! HOMESCHOOL KIDS MAGAZINE
messages.messageBody:
Hi there everyone,

All the online magazines are now ready for viewing. Please check
them out!

HOMESCHOOL KIDS MAGAZINE
http://pages.ivillage.com/mumof4nz/homeschoolkidsmagazine
This month we have:
- a story by Khyron Solomon called 'The Boy Who Turned into a Baby'
- a poem by Ranie titled 'If I...'
- a report on Honey Bees by Dominic Wagner
- some jokes from Cody Love

Please share what you've been doing in homeschool! Just copy and
paste a project you've done, or a story or a poem you have written -
we'd all enjoy reading your work! I know you all work hard!
(Email items to: homeschool_kids_magazine@... )

HOMESCHOOL MUMS MAGAZINE
http://pages.ivillage.com/mumof4nz/homeschoolmumsmagazine
This month we have:
- two poems by Pam Williams: 'Try everything: chocolate, prayer'
and 'Sit Still for Real'
- a link recommended for studies on the human body

Mums and Dads please share your thoughts with us, ideas you've found
useful, or anything else you think others might benefit from! We
even have categories for Homeschool Poems and Homeschool Jokes!
(Email items to: mumof4nz@... )

FRUGAL FAMILIES MAGAZINE
http://pages.ivillage.com/oneofusnz/frugalfamiliesmagazine
This month we have one item:
- Lisa has shared an idea on artwork for your walls!

Please share any frugal ideas, recipes, kids page items, good ideas
you've found! We'd love to read them!
(Email items to: oneofusnz@... )

Thanks for your interest - and have a great day won't you?

Teresa :)
Editor
Homeschool Kids Magazine
Homeschool Mums Magazine
Frugal Families Magazine
